name: Air Fryer Triple-Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies
author: Yoly
summary: I love experimenting with my air fryer oven and this recipe came out pretty good.
ingredients: 1 (3.4 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
directions: Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) according to manufacturer's instructions
Spray the air fryer basket with nonstick cooking spray
Mix oatmeal, flour, cocoa powder, pudding mix, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl until well combined
Cream butter, brown sugar, and white sugar together in another bowl using an electric mixer
Add oatmeal mixture and mix well
Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts
Drop dough into the air fryer using a large cookie scoop; flatten out and leave about 1 inch between each cookie
Cook until lightly browned, 6 to 10 minutes
Cool on a wire rack before serving
